text: <https://doesitarm.com/formula/openblas/|https://doesitarm.com/formula/openblas/>  I am not exactly sure what the implication of this is. Since Julia linear algebra is built on openblas, does it mean one can expect good performances out of matrix operations?

attachments.title: Does It ARM
attachments.text: Find out the latest app support for Apple Silicon and the Apple M1 Processor

elements.text: I am not exactly sure what the implication of this is. Since Julia linear algebra is built on openblas, does it mean one can expect good performances out of matrix operations?

text: Yes. Also, the master branch just got the capability to switch out the version of BLAS used.

elements.text: Yes. Also, the master branch just got the capability to switch out the version of BLAS used.
